B O C Gases Nigeria PLC Company Profile

BOC Gases Nigeria Plc is engaged in the manufacture of industrial and medical gases, and the sale of special gases, welding and medical equipment. The Company has a network of distributors and agents across Nigeria. The Company is a subsidiary of BOC Holdings Limited UK.
